flawed_nl_solution:
Anthony lost 6 pets, so he has 16 - 6 = <<16-6=10>>10 pets left.
Then 1/5 * 10 = <<1/5*10=50/1>>50/1 died from old age.
So, Anthony now has 10 - 50/1 = <<10-50/1=-40>>-40 pets.
#### -40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 50/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
